# GAME STARTS
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<Reasoning> Since this is the first round, I will contribute a small amount to test the waters. I'll contribute 2 coins. </Reasoning>
<CHAT> Hi everyone, contributing 2 this round. Let's see how this goes! </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>

CHICK: Let's try to cooperate!

<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 1.9×. </ROUND_INFO>

<CONTRIB> 2 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="12" multiplied_contrib="22.8" active_players="3" redistributed_each="7.6"/>

<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 4 coins to impose a deduction of 12.0 coins. Choose whom to punish and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>

<Reasoning> I'm contributing 6 coins, following my previous reasoning. </Reasoning>

<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 4 coins to impose a deduction of 12.0 coins. Choose whom to punish and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
